fields.headline: Desk bound
fields.bodyText: The problem Sitting in front of a computer all day has done wonders for your typing speed but turned your bottom into a booster cushion. The solution A personal consultation with nutritionist Janine Wilson, who will talk you back into size 10 trousers. The test I resisted the lunchtime yummy doorstop sandwiches. After handing Wilson my filled-in questionnaire on everything from allergies to favourite food, (she took me through the basic food mistakes I was making, and told me how I could reduce my pie-to-thigh ratio with a few simple changes. She left me with a dossier with a basic guide to nutrition and a personalised eating guide. The verdict Relaxed, friendly, but stern enough to elicit the truth on your dodgy dinners. Advice was clear and simple - no reference to funny diets or other food fads. The downside One session gives you the basics, but if you need motivation as well, you'd have to book more sessions. The damage From £150. The details lotus-exchange.com; 020 7463 2234, nationwide.
